name: Musical Cure
description:
-- GUIDE AT THE END OF THE DESCRIPTION -- 

Top-down 2d Puzzle Game:

 You are a young girl from a small town in Italy wants to cure her father who one day turned very sick. It was at that same time that a bard tale started spreading in Italy that the gods will smile their favor on whoever will manage to impress them with unique music that have never reached their ears before. 

Therefore, you decide that you will take this chance to impress the gods in order to cure your father and you think about creating a mix of ethnic instruments from Morocco, China, Italy.

Collaborative project with : 

  1. Oussama Ben Omar El Mdaghri (Developper)
  2. ALAMI IBN JAMAA Hamza (Developper)
  3. Giada Ye (Artist)
  4. Reda El Ouajjite (Music Artist)

Small guide :

  • R - to reset the puzzles
  • E - interact
  • Space - to be a ghost 
  • SPOILER : for the first level, you should knock respectively from left to right 1 4 4 3 times as seen on the carpet in the top room
  • SPOILER : for the second level, you should interact with all the torches and activate them by pressing E.
